name: SkyQuests
description:
Explore the world of Skyquests and its people living on a floating island on the verge of extinction.

You are the youngest of the survivors, who were chosen to inherit the powers of the god of winds, this way as your body adapts to the new powers you can unlock new ways to move around in the deserted lands below, you have a simple objective, gather materials not only to ensure the survival of the people of the sky island but also to try and claim back the land abandoned by your ancestors.

The Ollpheiste, monsters from the deep depths of the ancient Treygther City invaded the land of Speyra with the objective to take over its land, destroying almost all Duine society and turning the land into the sand, the last remaining people live on the Lorg island, a floating island protected by the ancient Deitha. The resources on the island are limited and with that in mind, they choose the youngest man capable of inheriting the power of the god of winds, Gaother with the intention of making him able to survive the deserted lands below and gather materials, as he gathers those materials the people in the Lorg island try to come up with a plan to go back to living on the land.

Gameplay

The player starts in a floating island, in this island the player can upgrade and gain new abilities by interacting with a mage in the middle of the town. This island also has NPCs that offer objectives for the player to complete which once completed the player is rewarded with skill points, which can be used for upgrades.

After the player is finished accepting quests and getting upgrades, they need to jump off the island and land on the world below.

Once down there they need to start running across the land to finish their quest objective which have the objective to collect materials from multiple sources.

During exploration the enemies that spawn around the player will become stronger and spawn more frequently the enemies objective is to stop the player from completing their quests and kill them.
